ygData.subject: RE: Kith Nerfed!!! Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: I was back to Kith and will prolly buy a condo - they showed me one and although the price was great (fire sale they said) it needed too much work. We looked
ygData.messageBody:
I was back to Kith and will prolly buy a condo - they showed me one and
although the price was great (fire sale they said) it needed too much work.
We looked at another but the agent musta forgot the keys cuz the doors were
locked and we could not get in. We did get to peek in though and see the
place was nicely done in early ranger (did you know that if you put your
nose to the wall and press your sit key, you will get a glimpse inside as
you sit down?)

The fog and dark were back - hmm I wonder what kinda bug or did they
re-patch something?

I like the undeads there a lot!! Blues and lots of them. Some reds too but
need just a bit of a stronger party. Zones real close. Lots of different
things to try on them. Zombies with diseases to resist. I got pretty good
xp in the hour or so we fought. But I am really liking the place and looks
like I will be there for the rest of this level.

Sylly Songsynger
<Spirit of the Moon>
Bard of the 35th song
somewhere on Innoruuk

p.s. we snuck our lev 18 bard brother into Old Guk last night. Well kinda
snuck - he hugged the left wall and pulled the greater ice boners. Good
thing there were 2 partys right there and we nailed the skellies (blue to me
at 35 - woo hoo!) The Assn room campers let him stay and gave him 2nd loot
rights. He camped for 3 hours and made pals healing a necro who was doing
the hp-to-mana thing. His turn to loot and no guise <sigh> Mean while, we
went down to Exe room and camped it for 3 hours. Died when we pulled a 6
froggie train and lost 1 of our 2 clerics early in battle and 3 tanks
decided to all attack different mobs. I lullaby'd with lute but the damn
tanks kept waking them up and you know the rest of the story. Our other
cleric gated out and helped us do CR - dragged us out and rezz'd us back.


-----Original Message-----
From: Andrew Simpson [mailto:hornsfan@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 04, 1999 7:08 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Kith Nerfed!!! Re: Undead
drops in Kithicor

From: "Andrew Simpson" <hornsfan@...>

>It used to be one of the most totally scary zones we had.
Even if there
>were no really bad mobs in there (after level 20/25 when
ghouls go green)
>it
>was still scary - dark, foggy, ucky noises and all.

Hmm, I was there last night and it was as dark and foggy as
always.

This time, however, I had the pleasure of getting attacked
by an enraged
dire wolf who was yellow to me! He triple attacked for
77,97, 93. Ouch!!

I was waiting for the Blair Witch to pop out. :)

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 39 Bard of Qeynos
